meanings.definition: To attach or fix (something) with glue again.
meanings.sent1: She reglues the broken pieces of her favorite mug.
meanings.sent2: He always reglues his model airplanes when they break.
meanings.sent3: The crafty squirrel reglues the acorns to the tree for fun.
meanings.sent4: The memories reglue themselves in her mind after the accident.
meanings.sent5: The teacher reglues the torn pages of the storybook with care.

meanings.definition: The act of attaching or fixing something with glue again.
meanings.sent1: The reglues of the toy cars were done neatly.
meanings.sent2: He keeps a box of reglues for his art projects.
meanings.sent3: The reglues of the puzzle pieces made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The reglues of the broken vase were a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The reglues of the torn poster were barely noticeable.
